pages.text: The $(item)GPS Area Tool/$ is an advanced version of the $(l:tools/gps_tool)GPS Tool/$, which can store $(italic)two/$ coordinates in the world. $(thing)Left-click/$ a block (or air) to change the first coordinate, and $(thing)right-click/$ for the second coordinate. By $(thing)right/$ or $(thing)left-clicking/$ in the air, you can configure the positions in a GUI. Additionally, you can change the $(thing)Area type/$, allowing you to preview the area in different configurations.

The $(item)GPS Area Tool/$ supports $(l:programming/variables#global)Global Variables/$ like the basic $(l:tools/gps_tool#variables)GPS Tool/$ does.$(p)In a $(l:programming/programmer)Programmer/$, $(thing)left-click/$ the programming area background with the $(item)GPS Area Tool/$ to create a new $(l:programming/area)Area/$ puzzle piece, or $(thing)left-click/$ on an existing $(l:programming/area)Area/$ puzzle piece to overwrite it.
